mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BOOK_MASTER T USING ( SELECT #{ISBN} AS ISBN, #{TITLE} AS TITLE, #{AUTHOR} AS AUTHOR, #{PUBLISHER} AS PUBLISHER, TO_DATE(#{PUBLISH_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PUBLISH_DATE, #{COVER_IMAGE} AS COVER_IMAGE FROM DUAL ) S ON (T.ISBN = S.ISBN) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.TITLE = S.TITLE, T.AUTHOR = S.AUTHOR, T.PUBLISHER = S.PUBLISHER, T.PUBLISH_DATE = S.PUBLISH_DATE, T.COVER_IMAGE = S.COVER_IMAGE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ISBN, TITLE, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBLISH_DATE, COVER_IMAGE) VALUES (S.ISBN, S.TITLE, S.AUTHOR, S.PUBLISHER, S.PUBLISH_DATE, S.COVER_IMAGE)
